tr.td:
Please specify the hospital(s) or healthcare facility/facilities that you've gone to for your medical care in the last five years.
Separate each hospital or healthcare facility with a semicolon. For example: Hospital A; Hospital B; Hospital C.

tr.td:
Which doctors or healthcare providers have you seen regularly for your medical care in the last five years?
Please specify the first and last name of each provider, as well as the city and state they're located. Separate each provider's information with a semicolon. For example: Dr. Jane Smith, San Francisco, CA; Dr. John Doe, San Mateo, CA.
